docs.lead_paragraph: The rookie quarterback Geno Smith had his moments against the Patriots on Thursday before three fourth-quarter interceptions short-circuited the Jets’ rallies.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Football column holds that New York Jets rookie quarterback Geno Smith had his moments in loss against New England Patriots before his three fourth-quarter interceptions short-circuited the Jets rallies.

headline.main: Jets Will Have to Let Top Rookies Show What They Can Do

docs.abstract: Sam Borden On Soccer column notes that Sunil Gulati, president of the US Soccer Federation and member of FIFA's executive committee, is opposed to FIFA president Sepp Blatter's desire to shift 2022 World Cup in Qatar to winter date.

docs.snippet: A matchup between Alabama and Texas A&M, with Johnny Manziel, has not stopped Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban from doing what he has done best: recruiting....
docs.lead_paragraph: A matchup between Alabama and Texas A&M, with Johnny Manziel, has not stopped Crimson Tide Coach Nick Saban from doing what he has done best: recruiting.
docs.abstract: Marquee college football matchup between Alabama and Texas A&M in College Station, Tex, is not distracting Alabama coach Nick Saban from his inimitable recruiting efforts, which have produced 14 first-round draft picks since his arrival at Alabama in 2007; A&M's Heisman Trophy winner Johnny Manziel is the only quarterback in Alabama's previous 19 games to upend the Crimson Tide.

headline.main: Big Game Doesn’t Stop Recruiting by Saban
headline.print_headline: Big Game Doesn’t Stop Recruiting By Saban
